${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:VierThrow.NAME: Vier Throw
${modID}:VierThrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Force NL ${modID}:Domino NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 4 0 ${modID}:Match

${modID}:FourthWall.NAME: Fourth Wall
${modID}:FourthWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Force NL ${modID}:Domino NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 4 0 ${modID}:Match

${modID}:Swans.NAME: Swans
${modID}:Swans.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Domino NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 2 2 ${modID}:Match
${modID}:Swans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Force NL ${modID}:Domino NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 2 2 ${modID}:Match
